Reviews.Title: Love this PhoneI!!
Reviews.Author: Donnie W.
Reviews.Content: This phone is great but I have had 2 & both have started to malfunction, the one was eventually ruined by water damage but was messed up even before that. The one I have now I am returning for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: Jew
Reviews.Content: Are there any protective cases for this phone. Because it should have some some Where on amazon if so can someone please let me know what to search

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked world GSM phone. 3G - 850/2100, 2G -850/900/1800/1900. Compatible with at&t;, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, Simple Mobile and other GSM networks. Please make sure your SIM card is not locked with PUK code
3G - 850/2100 bands. Fully compatible with at&t; at 3.75G, compatilble with T-Mobile at 2G. For other network such as Straight Talk, Trac fone, Simple Mobile or Net 10 will require a manual APN setup
Free Tether - Use your 3G data service as a WiFi hot spot and connect your notebook, ipad or other device for free. No need to pay monthly tether fee.
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby(one Micro SIM card)
ProductInfo.Name: unlocked Android 4.2 Dual SIM Mtk6582 Quad Core Mp4 Wifi GPS Cell Phone N8000 White GSM 3g Free Tether Wifi GPS At&t T-mobile No Contract Phone white
